author: Vivienne Clarke
title: Coronavirus: ‘I was so ill... I was having convulsions in bed’
description: The 28-year-old said the virus made him feel not far from death
content:
A coronavirus patient in County Kerry has spoken on radio about his experience battling the illness this past week.
The 28-year-old began showing symptoms shortly after returning home to Ireland from London. Michael Prendergast told Newstalk Breakfast that h… [+2080 chars]
